name: L.S., A Minor by A.S., Natural Parent and Guardian, v. David ESCHBACH, Jr., Inc. and Brenda Lowery, v. Wilmer C. Hosler and Donald M. Shellenberger. Petition of: L.S., A Minor by A.S., Natural Parent and Guardian

parties: L.S., A Minor by A.S., Natural Parent and Guardian, v. David ESCHBACH, Jr., Inc. and Brenda Lowery, v. Wilmer C. Hosler and Donald M. Shellenberger. Petition of: L.S., A Minor by A.S., Natural Parent and Guardian.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of March, 2004, the Petitions for Allowance of Appeal are hereby granted, limited to the following issue:
Whether the Superior Court erred in concluding that section 1705 of the Motor Vehicle Financial Responsibility Law, 75 Pa.C.S. § 1705, which restricts the recovery of individuals who have limited tort insurance coverage, applies not only to motor vehicle drivers and passengers, but also to pedestrians.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
844 A.2d 1215
L.S., A Minor by A.S., Natural Parent and Guardian, v. David ESCHBACH, Jr., Inc. and Brenda Lowery, v. Wilmer C. Hosler and Donald M. Shellenberger. Petition of: L.S., A Minor by A.S., Natural Parent and Guardian.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 3, 2004.
